information: We are a full service provider for the distribution of fresh fruit and vegetables from Spain in northern Europe. Our customers are wholesalers, fresh-cut ready-to-eat fruit and vegetables businesses and retailers in Scandinavia, the Baltic Countries and the United Kingdom. One of the things that makes us stand out is our broad range of “fresh from the field” products. We work with conventional products produced on a large scale, such as: Lettuces (Iceberg, Romaine, Little Gem), Brassicas (Broccoli, Cauliflower, Cabbages), Oranges, Lemons, Clementines, Cucumbers, Peppers, Tomatoes. Some of our biggest strengths are in specialities such organic products. But also work with oriental vegetables, aromatic herbs, sprouts, exotic produce and roots. We are certified by IFS Broker (Higher Level) and GlobalGAP (COC) and are member of the Amfori BSC Initiative. DAILY GREENS, our best in class brand PICK&JUICE, the brand for professional juicers JUST GREENS, the affordable everyday brand Greenfood Iberica is a part of Greenfood Group, one of the Nordic region’s leading groups in fresh healthy food.
keywords: Vegetables, fresh, Citrus fruits, fruit & vegetables, salads, DAILY GREENS
